title: tour: removing type from type conversion does not make any difference.
body:
Context: https://tour.golang.org/basics/13
 
The statement below imply that removing the type affect the result.
 
"Try removing the float64 or int conversions in the example and see what happens. "
 
I removed them, and tested their type using these lines.
 	fmt.Println(reflect.TypeOf(f))
	fmt.Println(reflect.TypeOf(z))
 
As far as I could tell, the result were the same even after removing type.  Maybe, there was a spec chagne?
